outcome: Human error causes drones to malfunction, dropping chaotic aid packages disrupting daily life and emergency services.

events.description: Drones malfunction city-wide, dropping unintended aid packages and sparking minor accidents.
Investigations reveal a recent software update caused the chaotic drone behavior.
Council reassures citizens as drone operations temporarily cease to prevent further chaos.
Teams work on rollback of drone software update, focusing on stabilizing emergency service integrations.
